attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is so much speculation weather or not Ghosts are real, example: many Councils have reports each year from residents complaining about strange forces. if the government could help funding then a paranormal department could be on-hand to help solve the problem and at the same help research the paranormal. To research the paranormal full-time costs a lot of money for one person... we need help with funding.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
